message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $20,000, given its unique benefits.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you be willing to negotiate further?
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still not able to pay more than $15,000 for the product. Would you be willing to lower the price to accommodate my budget?
